author: Jan Christensen
content: That was a teaser for sure, as the previous comments indicate. Would love to see more to find out how she handles in the various points of sail.

author: Rick Spilman
content: It is going to be fascinating to watch. Can she tack on foils? Can she jibe without pitchpoling? How does she handle downwind with a Code Zero? Time will tell.

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Wow. With no keel, the boat depends entirely on hydrodynamic forces to stay upright?

Assuming that’s the case, I’m really curious to see footage of raising and lowering sails.

Whatever the (im)practicalities, it’s a beautiful thing. ðŸ™‚
